sources.title: Make a Wish (1937) BASIL RATHBONE
sources.description:
Stars: Basil Rathbone, Bobby Breen, Marion Claire
Director: Kurt Neumann

While at summer camp in the Maine woods, a young boy befriends a composer who left the city to cure his writer's block, and is soon playing matchmaker for his widowed singer mother.

sources.title: Make a Wish (1937) Basil Rathbone | Comedy, Musical Full Length Movie
sources.description:
While at summer camp in the Maine woods, little Chip befriends composer Johnny, who left the city to try and break his creative block, and is soon playing matchmaker.

Director: Kurt Neumann
Writers: Gertrude Berg, Bernard Schubert 
Stars: Bobby Breen, Basil Rathbone, Marion Claire
Genres: Comedy, Musical

sources.title: Make_A_Wish_1937
sources.description: Basil Rathbone is a pleasant surprise as a young composer of Broadway music in search of his true love. He meets young boy Chip, played by the Canadian Bobby Breen, singing sensation until his voice changed as a teen. Chip's single mom becomes the romantic desire of Rathbone, but circumstances may keep them apart.

metadata.Plot: While at summer camp in the Maine woods, little Bobby Breen befriends composer Basil Rathbone, who left the city to try and break his creative block, and is soon playing matchmaker for his widowed singer mother and Rathbone.
metadata.Writer: Gertrude Berg, Bernard Schubert, Earle Snell
